scripts.concat: cat src/objects/*.js src/data/*.js src/lib/*.js src/scenes/*.js > dist/shikaku-madness.js
scripts.copy_to_cordova: cp dist/shikaku-madness.min.js cordova/www/javascript; cp node_modules/arcadia/dist/arcadia.js cordova/www/javascript; cp node_modules/sona/dist/sona.js cordova/www/javascript; cp -r assets/** cordova/www/assets
scripts.copy_to_web: cp dist/shikaku-madness.min.js ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku/javascript; cp node_modules/arcadia/dist/arcadia.js ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku/javascript; cp node_modules/sona/dist/sona.js ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku/javascript; cp -r assets/** ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku/assets; cp dist/index.html ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku; cp manifest.json ../../websites/ganbarugames.com/shikaku
scripts.cordova: npm run-script concat && npm run-script compress && npm run-script copy_to_cordova
scripts.web: npm run-script concat && npm run-script compress && npm run-script copy_to_web
